Uses of Class
metrics.perclass.AbstractAuxiliaryScores

Packages that use AbstractAuxiliaryScores 
Package Description
metrics.perclass
A package that implements simple metrics such as accuracy score, confusion matrix, F1 score, specificity score and sensitivity score among others, considering only individual classes.

  • Uses of AbstractAuxiliaryScores in metrics.perclass

    Subclasses of AbstractAuxiliaryScores in metrics.perclass 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  F1PerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the F1Score formula.
    class  FNPerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of False Negatives on multi-class problems
    class  FPPerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of False Positives on multi-class problems
    class  SensitivityPerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of Sensitivity on multi-class problems
    class  SpecificityPerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of Specificity on multi-class problems
    class  TNPerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of True Negatives on multi-class problems
    class  TPPerClass
    This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of True Positives on multi-class problems
